message.body: Hey when you are ready to do xmas shopping let me know. I know a list of things that Steph wants ranging from $10-40 but I probably won't be able to get em bec Im already spending too much on her
I figured I can pass those items off to you and marc if he is buying anything bec I know he don't have much money
Okay thanks. I won't be going soon. I just had an eye doctor appt and had to pay for the exam, contacts and glasses so that set me back
But I get paid next froday
Oh I know not soon... but I figured I'd let you know.. save you trouble worrying what to get when the time comes
I'm going to try to get them during black Friday that way its cheaper
I used some of the milk so you might need a new one
Also can I use the last dryer sheet? Or do you need it?
No go ahead I think we bought more
Yeah I noticed that after. Thanks
